name: xmlsquad/xml-authoring-tools
description: PHP Console commands for managing xml files.

suggest.xmlsquad/xmlauthor-example-command: To see example how to use AbstractCommand
suggest.xmlsquad/ping-drive: Reports its attempts at locating and reading the contents of a Google Drive folder or file
suggest.xmlsquad/gsheet-to-xml: Outputs the contents in the form of Xml from Google Sheet or Google Drive folder of sheets
suggest.xmlsquad/capture-lookups: Grabs Google Sheets and stores their data as CSV files
